articles.author: Ishaan Gera
articles.title: Service activity rises to 60.5 in June on spate of fresh orders, growth in overseas sales - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The 400 services firms surveyed for the index noted a further rise in export orders, with growth coming from Asia, Australia, Europe, Latin America, the Middle East and the US
articles.content: Indias services sector activity reached 60.5 in June, recovering from a five-month low of 60.2 in the previous month, on the back of a rise in new orders and expansion in international sales, accordi… [+1767 chars]
